DOC.brief_summary: The aim work evaluate efficacy sub lingual prostaglandin E1 synthetic analogue ( misoprostol ) IUD insertion facilitate procedure patient deliver cesarean section .
DOC.brief_title: Sub Lingual Misoprostol Before IUD Insertion Women With Only Previous Cesarean Section
DOC.detailed_description: The study conduct Ain Shams University Maternity Hospital . 124 woman candidate Cu T 380A IUD insertion enrol study . Half receive 400 micro gram misoprostol ( Sigma ) sub lingually half receive placebo two hour IUD insertion .
DOC.criteria: Normal size uterus . Willing participate . Candidate IUD insertion . Delivered cesarean section . Last delivery 40 day participate study . Previous vaginal delivery Signs genital infection . Menopause . Body mass index ( BMI ) > 35 kg/m2 . Contraindication misoprostol . Copper allergy . Positive pregnancy test . Had prior attempt IUD insertion . Uterine anomaly . Uterine fibroid .
